name: Bullet Charge (srawls1)
description:
Bullet Charge was developed by a team of 4 for the 2018 GMTK game jam. It is a top-down bullet hell shooter with limited ammo. You must catch specific bullets shot by enemies to replenish you ammo. Because ammo is so limited and you must be careful how you use it, you can charge your shots and slow down time while aiming.

Art by ShoujoSchmoe and tigersonalex.

Music/sound by StinkBrigade and Satellite.

Development by Alawliet and srawls (myself).
